name: Archaeologist
overview: Created by Liam O'Connor. Initially released in the Windows/MacOS/Linux compilation "Micro Entertainment Pack" in 2020. Later ported to 6502 based machines, this included the C64 and C16 too. This game is a minesweeper variant where you can choose the board size, the difficulty, use the cursor keys to move, space to dig and Enter\Return to put up a flag.
